title: Ticket #2957: Excise Quill references from documentation
description:
The presence of Quill reference in our documentation suggest that it remains a supported environment, which it isn't. Condor, as distributed, no longer supports Quill. In particular, I've fielded two Rust in the last two days from people trying to use Quill features.

This removal should be done in 7.6, as Quill is gone there.

Non-inclusive list of things to remove:

  • condor_history man page
    • -completedsince - Remove entirely; relies on Quill
    • -name - Remove entirely; relies on Quill
    • -f - Keep, but remove Quill details.
remarks:
2012-May-29 11:32:17 by smoler:
There is still a Quill subsection in the Contrib chapter. All index references should be isolated to this section, and clearly identified as part of the Quill source code contrib.
check_ins:
2012-May-29 11:28   Check-in [32128]: lotsa changes to isolate Quill to the contrib section, including changing lots of index entries. ===GT=== #2957 (By Karen Miller )
2012-May-29 10:13   Check-in [32127]: updated/removed man page options that mention or implement something for Quill; completely remove condor_load_history man page. ===GT=== #2957 (By Karen Miller )
2012-May-25 12:50   Check-in [32125]: no more Quill in condor_history manual page ===GT=== #2957 (By Karen Miller )
creator: adesmet
